Stefano_package.components

Interface ICadComponent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CadArc, CadCircle, CadComponent, CadComponent3D, CadCylinder, CadLineOrtho, CadParallelepiped, CadRectangle

    public interface ICadComponent
    This interface gives the main rules to create Stefano_package.components: get & set necessary methods and the core of the application: a JS writer that will draw CAD elements.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ICadComponent.Axis
      Enumerator for axes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getName()
      Get method for the name
      int getX()
      Get method for x
      int getY()
      Get method for y
      int[] projection(ICadComponent.Axis ax)
      This method will be used in order to detect collisions: it projects the component on the selected axis (2D component) or on the plane where the axis is the normal (3D component)
      void setPosition(int x, int y)
      This method sets a new position for the component
      java.lang.String toJsString()
      This method is the core of the application: it will generate a JS String that will describe the component and draw it on the framework.

    • Method Detail

      • setPosition

        void setPosition(int x,
                 int y)
        This method sets a new position for the component
        Parameters:
        x - New component's x-coord
        y - New component's y-coord

      • projection

        int[] projection(ICadComponent.Axis ax)
        This method will be used in order to detect collisions: it projects the component on the selected axis (2D component) or on the plane where the axis is the normal (3D component)
        Parameters:
        ax - the axis to project on
        Returns:
        the x1 and x2 of the segment in a 2-element array

      • getX

        int getX()
        Get method for x
        Returns:
        base point's x

      • getY

        int getY()
        Get method for y
        Returns:
        base point's y

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Get method for the name
        Returns:
        component's name

      • toJsString

        java.lang.String toJsString()
        This method is the core of the application: it will generate a JS String that will describe the component and draw it on the framework.
        Returns:
        The JS string describing the component
